com.stockticker.persistence

Interface PersistenceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockTickerPersistence

    public interface PersistenceService

    Provides public interface methods for the Persistence Service component.

    Version:
    1.0 03/11/2014
    Author:
    Stuart Connall
    See Also:
    StockTickerPersistence, PersistenceServiceException

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User createUser(String username, String password)
      Creates a new user in the database
      boolean deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes the specified user's information
      List<String> getLoggedInUsers()
      Returns a list of all logged in users
      List<String> getTrackedStocks(String username)
      Returns a List of stock symbols being tracked by a specific user
      User getUser(String username)
      Gets the specified user's information
      UserInfo getUserInfo(String username)
      Retrieves the user information associated with the specified user
      boolean isLoggedIn(String username)
      Checks if the specified user is logged in

      Tests if a stock is being tracked for a specific user
      boolean setLoginStatus(String username, boolean status)
      Sets the login status of the specified user

      Starts the Persistence Service which performs necessary initialization.

      Updates the specified user's information.
      boolean userExists(String username)
      Checks if a user exists in the database

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
           throws PersistenceServiceException
        Starts the Persistence Service which performs necessary initialization.
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - when either the UserDAO or TrackedStockDAO instances fail to initialize most likely due to database related issues.

      • getTrackedStocks

        List<String> getTrackedStocks(String username)
                              throws PersistenceServiceException
        Returns a List of stock symbols being tracked by a specific user
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        Returns:
        list of stock symbols
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • trackStock

        boolean trackStock(String username,
                 String stock,
                 boolean track)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Sets whether or not a stock is to be tracked
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        stock - stock symbol to track
        track - true to track, false to un-track
        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • isStockTracked

        boolean isStockTracked(String username,
                     String stock)
                       throws PersistenceServiceException
        Tests if a stock is being tracked for a specific user
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        stock - stock symbol to check
        Returns:
        true if tracked, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • userExists

        boolean userExists(String username)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Checks if a user exists in the database
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • createUser

        User createUser(String username,
              String password)
                throws PersistenceServiceException
        Creates a new user in the database
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        a User object if doesn't exist, null otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • updateUser

        boolean updateUser(User user)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Updates the specified user's information. Proper usage of this method requires call getUser first to obtain a valid User instance.
        Parameters:
        user - a User object instance
        Returns:
        true if updated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • getUser

        User getUser(String username)
             throws PersistenceServiceException
        Gets the specified user's information
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        a User object if exists, null otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(String username)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Deletes the specified user's information
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn(String username)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Checks if the specified user is logged in
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if logged in, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • setLoginStatus

        boolean setLoginStatus(String username,
                     boolean status)
                       throws PersistenceServiceException
        Sets the login status of the specified user
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        status - the login status to set (true or false)
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • getLoggedInUsers

        List<String> getLoggedInUsers()
                              throws PersistenceServiceException
        Returns a list of all logged in users
        Returns:
        list of logged in users
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • getUserInfo

        UserInfo getUserInfo(String username)
                     throws PersistenceServiceException
        Retrieves the user information associated with the specified user
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        a UserInfo object or null
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.
